microbit_car.pca9685_init|block: 初始化PCA9685芯片 地址$chipAddress 频率$newFreq
microbit_car.CarRotation|block: 小车原地旋转 速度百分比$speed
microbit_car.CarTranslation|block: 小车平移 速度百分比$speed, 角度$degrees
microbit_car.MotorControl|block: 单个电机控制 $motor, 速度百分比$speed
microbit_car.setServoPosition|block: 舵机控制 端口$servoNum, 角度$degrees
microbit_car.setLedDutyCycle|block: 设置PWM输出 端口$ledNum, 占空比$dutyCycle
microbit_car.hiwonder_line_followers_ini: 初始化巡线传感器 地址$chipAddress
